mil3.1.11:0.1_0: The Simile of the Making Hand
mil3.1.11:1.2_0: “Great king, suppose someone, seeing the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection once she sees the fruit of stream-entry, once-returning, non-returning, or perfection.
mil3.1.11:1.3_0: That’s how purity of faith is due to reality.”
mil3.1.11:2.3_0: In the same way, a layman whose mind is freed from the fruit of stream-entry, once-return, non-return, or perfection.
mil3.1.11:2.4_0: That’s how purity of faith is decrepit.
mil3.1.11:2.5_0: The Linked Discourses on the Buddha is just for one side.
mil3.1.11:3.3_0: By energy you get past suffering,
